mapper.select: select * from review where id=#{id} and reviewnum=#{reviewnum}
mapper.delete: delete from review where id=#{id} and reviewnum=#{reviewnum}
mapper.update: update review set reviewtitle=#{reviewtitle}, reviewcontents=#{reviewcontents}, star_input=#{star_input}, rating=#{rating}, rating2=#{rating2}, rating3=#{rating3}, rating4=#{rating4}, image=#{image} where id=#{id} and reviewnum=#{reviewnum}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, c.* from(select a.reviewnum,a.image,a.code,a.ID,a.CODENAME,a.NAME,a.reviewTITLe,a.reviewcontents,a.WRITEDATE, b.indexcnt from review a,(select indexnum,count(*) indexcnt from COMMENTTABLE GROUP by indexnum)b where TO_CHAR(a.reviewnum)=b.INDEXNUM(+) and code=#{code})c)WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select count(*) from review where code=#{code}
select count(*) from review where ${search_key} like '%'||#{search}||'%'
